author: camolezi
body:
#### PR description:
We can move the boost spirit includes to the implementation file.
Since TrackerDetIdSelectorGrammar is only used here, we can isolate it in the source file. 
This change will increase modularity, and possibly helps us with c++20 clang modules.

#### PR validation:
Code compiled

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
@vgvassilev @davidlange6
title: [FastSimulation/TrackingRecHitProducer] Move boost spirit headers to source file
